fedge("forgot",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,unlocked).
fedge("forgot",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,error).
fedge("forgot",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,locked).
fedge("maybe_lock",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,locked).
fedge("maybe_lock",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,locked).
fedge("maybe_lock",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,error).
fedge("maybe_lock",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,unlocked).
